website_summaries.verdict: A simple yet quality tangle-free spinning flagpole that is heavy-duty and lightweight.
pros: We love how his flagpole is strong and sturdy but lightweight
The brushed silver ball decoration adds a touch of class
Comes with rings that prevent flags from getting tangled
Spinning pole is more durable than a stationary pole
cons: The plastic rings that hold the flag can break in high winds

customer_reviews.title: Will not last.
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, the plastic rings that come with the pole are extremely cheap. The day I bought it, one came off and was never seen again. Luckily, I had bought some heavy duty metal spinner holders as well and they worked together great. However, after having this flag six months in (admittedly very windy Kansas), the plastic connections between the metal pole have worn out and the pole fell apart. For the price that I paid, this is unacceptable and not worth the price. While in concept it works extremely well, the product does not last. Quite disappointed and overall, quality is just not up to par for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jovi13

customer_reviews.title: Flag clips broke within 6 months of use!
customer_reviews.text: Our previous flag pole lasted us 10 years in the tough Georgia weather. We replaced it with this model, thinking that the spinning flag mount would give us a better flowing flag. Our old flag pole would rarely tangle itself up and it would usually untangle itself. This pole did function better and almost never tangled itself up, but the clips both broke with the winds that came last week. The lack of durability is very disappointing and I would recommend to buy a different pole.
customer_reviews.author: rossdp

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment and a hassle
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was metal, but it is almost all cheap plastic. It is completely unintuitive if your grommets on the flag are large (which most are) and you essentially have to rig it work. I don't have any twist ties so I am holding it in place with a zip tie. If I want to change out the flag I will cut the zip tie and replace it. A larger screw head or washers would accomodate all grommet sizes, but no, they don't include that, you have to mess with emailing them and getting some sent back. What a bad decision to buy this half baked product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much I bought another!
customer_reviews.text: I received my flag pole and was so pleased by it that I purchased another. Now I have my American flag proudly displayed every day and my favorite NFL team flag conveniently on another flag pole to switch out on game days. We had a fairly breezy day this week and the flag never tangled (though the neighbors flag, displayed on a different flag pole, did). The flag looks much more impressive now on such a beautiful pole, too! Very easy to assemble. Had our flag flying in no time. Note that this is the flag pole only. You will need to purchase a mounting bracket separately.
customer_reviews.author: Trish H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!  Small American Company - Support them!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design. A real no tangle solution for flags. Best pole I've ever purchased. The customer service is off the charts. Once ordered they will send you additional tips and tricks for set-up. They also invite you to write them should you have any problems whatsoever. As my title says, this is a small American company and is very well run. I will look to them for my flag needs from now on. Support them!
customer_reviews.author: A. Cerqua

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Rings that hold Flag to Pole Are Worthless
customer_reviews.text: The pole itself is fine, but the plastic rings & "bolt (also plastic)" that are meant to fit through the grommets of your flag are very poorly made and will not screw together to hold each end of the flag. Any motion from wind causes the bolts with their poorly made grooves to pop out and there goes your flag. Your flag tangles even when they're screwed in temporarily. Look elsewhere for a tangle-free flagpole.
customer_reviews.author: Philip A. Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: No more daily unwinding!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have found this pole years ago. Previously my flag was wound up more often than not and I unwound it every time I passed by. My husband put it up so I couldn't tell you how the magic works but even with all of the spring winds blowing my flag is never tangled anymore. Highly recommend. Not sure how it wears, as it's only been up a couple weeks but it appears to be better quality than my old ones. The pole is in two pieces, had hoped it was a single piece to avoid a potential weak point. I'm so happy with the way this works that I'm fine with that
customer_reviews.author: Kat Lur

customer_reviews.title: Love This Flag!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful flag - light weight with vibrant colors and is well made. The pole is sturdy and does not bow. The pole and grommets assembled very easily. In the breeze/wind the flag truly does NOT get wrapped around the pole. Because the flag is not lighted, I take it down at sunset and put it out again on "flag" days. I just roll up the flag on the pole and stand it behind the back door. It stays rolled up and out of the way, but because I see it, I am reminded to put it out on flag days. Love This Flag!
customer_reviews.author: Kael

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I got this pole because of the non tangle aspect. I had to keep flipping my flag several times a day on my old pole. The new pole looks great, very substantial looking. Customer service is outstanding. In the directions they mentioned some flags have oversized grommets which cause the flag to slip over the mounting bolts. They said to let them know if I needed larger bolts. I had also purchased a new flag which turned out to have the larger grommets. I e-mailed them and received a response the same day indicating they were shipping the new bolts. I am very pleased with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this pole.
customer_reviews.text: On it's way back to Amazon. The two plastic circular rings which are supposed to attach the flag to the pole are simply a ring and plastic bolt type device the end of which is supposed to hold screw the grommet and secure the flag to the pole. Unfortunately, the heads of these are so small that the grommets pass through making it impossible to secure the flag. I considered getting two stainless steel washers to correct this but realized that the approximately 3/8" gap would soon wear through and good bye flag. JUNK!!!
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Tangles all the time. Advertised to never tangle...?
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed in this pole. It is a bit expensive and falsely advertised: “No longer suffer the frustration of your flag wrapping around your flag pole in the wind. Replace the stationary flag pole that came in your original set with this superior quality 6 ft LONG by 1 in DIAMETER spinning flag pole, specifically DESIGNED TO PROHIBIT FLAG TANGLING.” My flag is tangling nonstop with a weak breeze. It is getting more than frustrating to continuously untangle it when it is advertised to never happen. I wish I could get a refund to buy a different brand that actually stops this from happening. *view image attached.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully, it works for a while
customer_reviews.text: I'm not blown away by the quality. Many parts seem unlikely to last very long. In particular, the tubing appears to be too thin for expected loads and the joint between the two sections seems suspect. In part because the pole was too long and in part because it was sagging under its own weight, I trimmed off about 10 inches with a hack saw. The good news is that it was easy to cut given its light weight. Also, the end cap could be easily re-installed. It definitely appears to be under less stress with the reduced length. Also, it places the flag at a better height.
customer_reviews.author: d. ward

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this 6-ft flag pole and it works fine. It came with 2 pieces to lengthen the pole. We only use the top one (half size). But the pole has a clip for the top of the flag, but no clip for the bottom part of the flag so we had to use a zip tie to tie the flag to the pole. The top clip is very small too. It was diffiicult to run use the clip to the hole of the flag. Anyways, we made it work. There hasn't been any wind so I don't know how well it would fare when it's windy. Stay tune!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great flagpoles very solid.
customer_reviews.text: Great flagpole, sturdy and very well made. Personally I don’t like the spring clips and plastic holders it comes with they don’t do a good job of securing the flag. I use these to fly my flags from my truck to the wind gets a little intense so I need them to be more secure. I actually bought separate swivel holders to use. My choice. I feel it’s such a solid flagpole it should come with better flag clips maybe carabiner ones and better swivel holders like the ones I purchased separately. If you are using this just for outside your home with a mild breeze you will be fine. Otherwise I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Costanzo

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The day after putting up our flag we had a wind storm. The flag I installed is made of a heavy canvas like material and even with the added weight the no tangle pole did its job; stood up to the 30 to 40 mile and hour gusts and the extra weight of the canvas flag whipping in the wind. I would recommend this pole to anyone who wants to display their respect and love for what our flag stands for. Super easy to put together and communication with the sell/manufacture is first rate if you have any questions.
customer_reviews.author: Dano

customer_reviews.title: Easiest to set up no-tangle flagpole out there!
customer_reviews.text: This flagpole was exactly what I was hoping for in terms of sturdiness, ease of set up, and the ability to provide years of service from what I observed in the quality of the workmanship and the quality of the materials. I was somewhat skeptical of the plastic parts so I emailed the support line of the company and almost immediately got a reply assuring me that these parts have proven quite durable in this application and if they do fail, there is a lifetime warranty on the parts and they will replace them free of charge. Excellent product, excellent customer support, worthy of a 5 star rating!
customer_reviews.author: M. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic flagpole for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: I am a veteran and fly our nations symbol of freedom, Old Glory. This flagpole has ball bearings so your flag will never get wrapped around the pole. Such frustration with other flagpoles is alleviated by the awesome design of this marvelous product. The old wooden flagpole faded, cracked and turned black because of the materials used. The aluminum used in this pole is sturdy and will last at least a decade if not longer. A beautiful, strong and glorious design streamlines our nations patriotic symbol The Stars and Stripes. I will recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Kern

customer_reviews.title: Flag not included, but it’s a really nice pole!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll give this 4 stars for the quality of the pole, but begrudgingly. Somehow I missed the fact that the flag was NOT included, and I accept responsibility for that. I suppose I figured it was due to the price, so I was a bit disappointed when just the pole arrived. It’s a very nice pole but I wouldn’t have spent that much on just a flag pole. That being said, it still looks great and is in excellent condition. It is windy and rains a lot here and the flag flies 24/7, and I’m fairly sure that pole will outlive a few flags!
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Do not believe the hype!
customer_reviews.text: This pole is advertised as preventing flags from wrapping around the pole. As you can clearly see, it fails in that promise. When I contacted the company, they suggested that I attach the bottom grommet with a zip tie and use the attached clip for the top grommet. That did not work either. They said that it "should" work for 3' by 5' flags; however, my flag is 4' by 6'. Initially, they said this pole could accommodate my flag. After it failed to prevent wrapping, they backed off this claim. I don't know if it will prevent wrapping for a smaller flag, but I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Rotating Pole for the money; flag is okay.
customer_reviews.text: The pole gets 5 stars and is a quality item that appears to hold up well over time. The flag will last about a year with constant southern sun & wind exposure in SoCal; it will fade considerably over time and the wind will eventually rip the material at the edges. However if you retire the flag nightly (which I tried for awhile), it should last longer much longer? Consider the flag a bonus that comes with a quality rotating pole.
customer_reviews.author: gnosisguy

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates Most All Tangling
customer_reviews.text: These are really well made and work very well to keep flags from tangling. If your flag is relatively heavy, it will not tangle at all. If you have very light flags, they can tangle some, but almost always straightens themselves out. We live on the side of the hill and updrafts cause our flags to spin and spin and spin around poles. Without a rotating pole like this, we would be unwinding our flags all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Magic

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS FLAG POLE!! 💕💕💕
customer_reviews.text: This pole actually works!! It spins round so my flag doesn’t roll over and over!! The pole was too long to my liking and I wanted it and decorative ball to be black. So we sawed off 10” and spray primed and painted it all. Not a big deal at all. We’ve recommended it to several other friends. We always have a pretty flag out so I’m Very happy! It’s also cheaper than some I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi C

customer_reviews.title: Was nicely package in appropriate size box within a box
customer_reviews.text: Was nicely package in appropriate size box within a box. I have the US flag already attached and hung my pole outside, so far so good, it works as described, looks nice. The only reason I give 4 stars is because it is a shame the ball looks cheap but then I knew that from a previous comment, anyhow not so important as our home is set back a ways from the road, it still looks good and does the job. I would recommend purchasing this pole, I just received a different pole, shorter because I wanted to also hang a UK flag but will be returning a it is two pieces and doesn't even fit together!!
customer_reviews.author: DjW

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I put this up before the start of football season and less than two months later the bottom ring broke. I took the pole down and tried to separate the two pieces to fix it but the whole thing fell apart. The plastic pieces all came off and a ton of ball bearings fell out. Now it's just in pieces. I paid a little more for this, rather than the cheap one Amazon suggested, hoping it would last but I guess not.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Good Product and Works as Cescribed.
customer_reviews.text: Flag pole arrived quickly and went together effortlessly. The design, construction and quality demonstrate it is a well thought out product. Mounted it the same day it arrived and it has worked flawlessly since and our flag does not furl anymore. We get a lot of wind here at times and the flag continues to fly without the usual furling experienced with the old pole. Glad we made the purchase. The Co. even did follow-up with us to ensure we were completely satisfied. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Richard Moody

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Flagpole!
customer_reviews.text: I have a sleeved flag, it was always getting tangled up on my old wooden pole, it had a cheap plastic spinning collar at the top, but didn't spin very easily. This new aluminum pole is designed so the whole top half of the pole spins, zero tangles now! Love this pole! It can be used with grommet flags too, there are 2 plastic rings that come with it. You won't be disappointed with this one!
customer_reviews.author: S. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Grommet clips leave much to be desired
customer_reviews.text: Not only are the plastic rings that come with the pole cheap plastic, the heads to them were also too small to hold the 3x5 American flag in place, so I've had to order replacement clips. The grommet holes on my flag are just a little over 1/2" for reference. So play on adding another $12 to your purchase for replacement clips if the flag you have has grommet holes on the larger side.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Walker

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought it would be, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: First off I wasn’t expecting much, and thought this was probably overpriced. It’s more than I wanted to pay for it, but it is a lot stronger and better quality than I thought it would be. I had a problem with the plastic screws not being large enough for the grommets on my flag. I called the seller and they immediately shipped larger ones to me. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: The best flag pole on the market
customer_reviews.text: For years I have gone out and either removed my flag from the light mounted to my house or had to unwrapped it from the pole. I bought this flag pole just over a month ago and my flag has been through snow, rain and high winds and I have never had to untangle the flag. It is a flawless design, looks beautiful and does exactly what it is promoted to do. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: acoustic58

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST, period!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best flag pole I have ever purchased. My previous poles would have the flag wrapped around them and I would have to unwrap the flag to fly properly. This one has never wrapped the flag around yet. It always flies perfectly. Love It!
customer_reviews.author: LRG

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but works for now
customer_reviews.text: Seriously cheap. I would guess made in China. The pieces that attach to the flag are cheap clear plastic rings with plastic screws that thread into them. The idea is to put the cheap plastic screw through the eyelet in the flag and thread this screw into the cheap plastic threads in the cheap plastic ring that goes over the flag pole, then tighten the same cheap plastic screw to secure the ring to the flag pole. I'll bet I'm replacing these parts with zip ties or the whole assembly in two years!
customer_reviews.author: David Mitchel

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Come w/ a Holder?!
customer_reviews.text: Idk if it's just because I'm addicted to Amazon and buy practically everything I think of the second I think of it and so I didn't thoroughly read the item description or if this is something overlooked on the seller's part BUT.. I assembled the flag pole (cheap material but obviously equivalent to the price, I suppose), pulled out and unfolded my flag, attached it, went to go put it up... And realized there's no way to actually attach it to my house?! So I must be dumb. Or something's missing here. 🤷
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works just as advertised !
customer_reviews.text: My flag used to tangle up all the time with a traditional pole. I bought this pole, along with a heavier quality embroidered flag and I have not seen it wound or tangled a single time since. When I got the pole, I thought it might be flimsy as it's not that thick, but I was wrong. It has been very durable, even in windy situations when I was not home to bring it inside. I highly recommend this pole if you get frustrated with your flag being wadded up on the pole. I do recommend a good quality flag to go along with it, as the weight helps the pole to turn as designed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Harris

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about 10 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a champ for about 10 months. Now it does not rotate as smoothly, if at all, and the flag gets hung up on it every easily. The flag gets frayed fairly regularly, but I just hit the ends with a heat gun. If you are looking for solution to your flag getting hung up, but not necessarily a permanent solution, this should do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Skippy

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for what it is....cheaper alternatives of the same pole elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I managed to get about a year and a half out of mine - daily use. So from that aspect, yeah it works. The plastic connector that holds the two halfs together broke, but there was enough material to keep it functional. Went to local Menards - had the same pole from another company - but still made in China - for about $15 - which seems about right for this pole.
customer_reviews.author: Vytas A. Boyev

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic flag fasteners break easily.
customer_reviews.text: The pole is very well constructed but the plastic screw that fastens the flag to the pole was to small for the grommet on my flag and I had to use a washer to keep it from coming off. After 5 minutes in a 10 MPH wind, the plastic screw broke off (no I didn't over tighten it) and now it's useless. I'll try to remove the remaining part of the broken screw and replace it with a metal one if possible. Disappointed in the cheap plastic flag fasteners. Update: The seller sent me 2 new fasteners. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: ok for the money just trh and find a way to secure ur flag on it
customer_reviews.text: ok for price. Doesnt have way to secure ur flag a high winds blew my flag off the first night. Not the most durable it now has a slight bend in it where it goes together
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: FLAG NOT INCLUDED
customer_reviews.text: Did NOT come with a flag. If I wanted to pay $30 for a pole I would have paid the extra $10 to get the combo pack with a flag also It does NOT STATE THAT It is sold separately in this ad!!! I bought this as a birthday gift for my 80 year old grandmother as a replacement for her torn one. Imagine how it felt opening it for her to find out there is no flag with this...!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect !! This pole was as described and very easy to assemble!! I love the swivel rings that keeps your flag from wrapping around the pole !! It's very sturdy!! The day after I put mine up, we had a storm come thru with 40 to 60 mph winds and no issues with the pole at all !! I reccomend this for anyone looking for a quality product!! And it's made in the U.S.A. !!!
customer_reviews.author: ken wing

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new flagpole. I ordered it by mistake, thinking that it included the flag. My husband ribbed me about not reading the details but he put it up on our boat anyway and I ordered a new flag. The best part is that it DOESN'T tangle....and he doesn't have to reach up and untangle the flag ( putting his shoulder in jeopardy). So...thanks for a great product. It really works!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon reader

customer_reviews.title: Great service on an excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work, as there have no tangles, and the quality is well above the piece of junk it replaces. The finish is nice and it appears well machined. But, customer service is the outstanding feature. An email explaining how to use the pole, a follow up to make sure it was set up properly and then an offer of more secure flag attachment hardware (due to large grommets) were unexpected bonuses. There is plenty of good service on Amazon, but this was startling.
customer_reviews.author: hjb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pole with great features
customer_reviews.text: “Good value if you already have mounts for the pole and a nice flag. The pole itself is attractive and looks good up on my house. Instructions came via email as well as the package - a nice touch. The pole is two sections that thread together. The top section actually rotates. I also used rotating flag mount rings. With this set-up, flag tangling and wrapping around the pole is no longer a concern."
customer_reviews.author: PapaBrian_inWV

customer_reviews.title: Flag attachment options need work
customer_reviews.text: I love the pole however the plastic rings that came with it to hang the flag are a joke. My flag grommets are way too big. The other option included one clip at the top. I was forced to zip tie the bottom grommet of the flag on. It works but seems silly to have to do. ***UPDATE 3/10/2018: The company came across my review and they are sending me more functional rings for my flag at no cost to me. I think that is outstanding customer service and hope it works as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This pole is about a foot and a half longer than my old one and the flag is also much bigger. The first day I put it up happened to be an unbelievably windy day and I really expected the pole to bend. It flew all day long in that wind and held up beautifully. Time will tell how it wears, but it looks great with my new flag. After more than a year it still looks and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Junior Clouseau

customer_reviews.title: Best flag pole I've purchased!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pole I've purchased from you in the last 2 1/2 years and will be buying one more very soon. Great flag pole and design. No problem with my flag wrapping around the pole in the wind. Love it. Problem is, I live in Texas and the wind isn't kind sometimes. The last one broke during an unexpected wind storm and I was away from home. To have the greatest flexibility means some weak points. All that said. Great product. You're on my speed order list.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Crews

customer_reviews.title: Great Company and American Made
customer_reviews.text: New flag pole is quality made and easy to assemble and install. A good reason to buy USA poles and flags. Be patriotic by not only flying your American flag but also buying American made products. Very few companies send you emails thanking you for buying their product but this one certainly does, then follows up to ensure the customer is totally happy, a pleasant surprise. I will definitely buy all my flags and accessories from them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Danny L Moore

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but...
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as it should, however, it would be better as a 5' pole rather than 6'. It is longer than a normal pole and it tends to get bent easier than a shorter pole in high winds. It does, however, ensure your flag does not tangle. IMO, it is a foot too long however and would be better as a standard 5' house flag pole.
customer_reviews.author: Mongo

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Selling this product for $27. 86 and not receiving a holder is not right I thought I was getting a holder to go with the flagpole very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and Wonderful Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We bought this flagpole to display our new 3x6 Thin Blue Line flag. My husband had no problems putting it together. The management actually emailed us to ask if we had any problems putting it together. Initially, the plastic rings that are used if you have rivits in your flag were too small for the rivits. I replied to their email about this, and they actually sent us a larger pair. Excellent product, very well made, and works great (no more tangled flag), and wonderful customer service. NOTE, the flag does not come with a bracket, but we knew that from the product description and reviews. We bought one at Home Depot that works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Nash

customer_reviews.title: Impressed/tangle free!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy! We were skeptical that our flag would not tangle as our porch area catches a cross wind & flags tangle almost immediately. We have several slip on flags, this spinning pole has a clip that helps keep them flying straight! I haven’t see it tangled at all since installing. Installation was easy as well. We are IMPRESSED!
customer_reviews.author: SharonB

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, your flag will never tangle or get wrapped around the pole, and they are very well made, yet light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Tree of Life Counseling

customer_reviews.title: Works Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first but I have to say that it is very infrequent that the flag gets tangled. Even when it does, if I let it sit long enough it will generally untangle itself with the next breeze. It works well to my surprise. I would recommend this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super value for a high-end functioning house flag pole
customer_reviews.text: Can attach both top and bottom for grommet hole flags, or clasp at the top for non-grommet flags (and you can easily use the bottom grommet clamp to hold the bottom of a non-grommet flag. LOVE that the entire flag attachment section is on ball bearings and rotates independent from the pole itself, to assure the flag will not get wrapped around the pole. Lots of good engineering here for the money. And attractive. A super upgrade from my old wooden pole with "independent" attachments that were supposed to prevent flag-wrapping, but didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised - no more tangled US flag
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised - no more daily trips to untangle our flag. Tested yesterday in 25mph+ gusts, no wrap. See accompanying photos- the flag will raise up and then either return back or simply pivot around the pole. Don’t be that house that has a tangled US flag all the time!
customer_reviews.author: GMan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly. Was very easy to assemble and install. The only problem was the rings were too small for our flag so the company was nice enough to send us larger ones. Company also emailed me to make sure everything was to our satisfaction. Who does that anymore? Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Diane in Texas

customer_reviews.title: This flag pole is great! The first day we put up it was ...
customer_reviews.text: This flag pole is great! The first day we put up it was quite windy as we live in New England. I was curious if it would tangle as my last one did. I was so happy to see that this one did not tangle or get wrapped up as described. We love it! It's very nice looking as well. Would definitely order it again! It arrived on time and the company that sells it, EverSun Products followed up with me with a personal email which is very impressive these days. We highly recommend this flag along with the company EverSun products as their customer service was excellent!
customer_reviews.author: TraceyMartin Drouin

customer_reviews.title: Love my flagpole
customer_reviews.text: I tried the plastic flag mounting rings. Then I tried the aluminum ones and they were fine, but would have had to drill holes in the flagpole so that the flag did not get caught on the screws. And, they wouldn't fit my metal flagpole. So, enough was enough. I quit wasting my money on cheap solutions that didn't work and bought this No Tangle Spinning Flagpole. I love it. It is very attractive and more importantly sturdy. And, the flag hasn't got hung up once. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: WinstonCup

customer_reviews.title: Found it!  THIS is the one!
customer_reviews.text: I was super disappointed by the flag poles in the box stores - the flag was always tangled and wrapped around the flag pole!... I set about to find a tangle-free flag pole, figuring it can't be that hard. After all of the reviews, I found this product, and I HIGHLY recommend it!! Stop looking! Buy this one now!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lins

customer_reviews.title: A superior quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a quality product which works exactly as described. It’s now been flying our flag for several days in moderate winds with not one tangle. The same flag on our old flagpole always wound over on itself and needed daily de-tangling. The swivel design of this pole is ingenious.
customer_reviews.author: Jon L.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold a flag with grommets unless you have washers
customer_reviews.text: The plastic screws to hold the flag through the grommets don’t work, the screw just goes right through the flags grommet. I had to use some washers to stop that from happening. I’m not sure how well the plastic pieces will hold up. Also the two poles come together with a plastic piece that I’m also unsure of.
customer_reviews.author: Bronson E. Westlund

customer_reviews.title: This may be a larger diameter than your previous flagpole.
customer_reviews.text: While the pole itself was easily assembled, it did not fit in our traditional holder. My husband had to remove our existing bracket, purchase a new, larger one and install it before we could put out our flag. This was a big hassle, requiring a rotor hammer type drill to go into our brick. Shouldn’t all flagpoles be of the same diameter? Why is this one larger? As mentioned in earlier reviews the plastic clips seem flimsy, but so far, so good. Our flag has been out nearly a month, but we have not had much bad weather. On a bright note, the tangle free feature seems to work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Eclectic-Eccentric

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality of this product. We highly recommend, because the quality is so excellent. For example, they use an ingenious method of keeping the flag from flipping over the flag pole, and it works really well! We had a question, and the company promptly responded with terrific customer service. We will definitely buy from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Wombat

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: After years of untangling flags, I think we have finally solved our problem. It's only been up 2 days, but it is still hanging perfectly straight, no tangles and no wrapping around itself. We were usually out there at least every couple days fixing it. So excited to have found this flagpole!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more for this excellent spinning pole that works as intended and saves the ...
customer_reviews.text: Forget the individually mounted flag pivots that attach to your solid metal pole. They're made of plastic components that bind so that the flag doesn't rotate freely, which causes the flag to wrap around the pole anyway. Spend a little more for this excellent spinning pole that works as intended and saves the disappointment you'll experience with a cheaper approach.
customer_reviews.author: Holly B

customer_reviews.title: The spin is great
customer_reviews.text: The pole spins as described so my flag flies proudly. The grommet holes on my flag were bigger than the bolts to hold on to pole. The company shipped me larger bolts which work perfectly. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M P

customer_reviews.title: Needed Sturdy, No Wrap Flag Pole
customer_reviews.text: The installation was easy and the flag pole is strong. I live in Florida and the weather will ruin a wooden pole in one year. This aluminum pole looks like it will do the job. The pole swivels with the direction of the flag. I will know exactly how well it works in our next Florida thunderstorm.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Withstands winds
customer_reviews.text: Finally a pole that stands up to the storms we’ve been having in SC. I’ve gone through several other than have snapped due to the wind. This has withstood several storms so far and no issues. It also doesn’t seem to be rusting like others have. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany C.

customer_reviews.title: Made to really prevent flag tangling or wraparound
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised that the entire upper portion of the flag pole rotated on ball bearings. There is really no need for the rotating clips that attach to the pole as well. The flag always hangs down and will never wrap around itself. Great design and a nice looking product. I highly recommend this flag pole.
customer_reviews.author: Bob C

customer_reviews.title: Your flag will never get tangled up again
customer_reviews.text: It arrived as promised and was very easy to assemble. I absolutely LOVE the flagpole. I always keep an American flag on my house and have gone through multiple flag poles. I am very excited that this will be the last. The added bonus is my flag will last so much longer because it spins and doesn’t get tangled up around the pole and torn. I highly recommend the 6 foot aluminum no tangle spinning flagpole..
customer_reviews.author: JBL

customer_reviews.title: Nice flagpole, be sure to order bracket!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these and they are very nice - but them didn't come with a bracket to attach the flags pole to your house. Had to order those after the flag poles were received. The bracket should be included, in my opinion....
customer_reviews.author: LKF Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Love these poles
customer_reviews.text: Love these poles. Brought 2 for the front of the house and ended up buying a 3rd for the back deck garden flag. Love how I don't have to unwrap my flags anymore! Only 1 thing... manufacture needs to include an extra set of the plastic screws, have had one come out or break and of course could not find it. Had an extra from the 3 pole and used it as a replacement. So far so good on the others.
customer_reviews.author: High Octane

customer_reviews.title: This is the best flagpole I have used.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new flag but the pole that came with it was a bigger diameter than my old 1" diameter pole, so I bought this one. This is the first spinning flagpole I have owned that actually works! Simple to assemble and install the flag. We've had this for about a month and the flag has not tangled one time. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg J.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy weak and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Super weak pole that bent and broke the first time it got windy. If you live in the midwest or somewhere where it is windy dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Gray

customer_reviews.title: Fly the flag proudly, let it wave in the breeze
customer_reviews.text: Our flag was always wrapping around the pole since we have much more wind in this location. Found this flag pole and it works like a champ. Very rarely is the flag wrapped. The flag is always waving in the breeze and rotates with the swivels on this pole. Great invention!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looking Good!
customer_reviews.text: The flag pole was shipped right away. I unpacked it and discovered a screw was missing from one of the rings. I replied to an email the manufacturer had sent to Me. They replied right away, saying they would send out another set of rings and screws. Meanwhile, I used the clip at the top of the pole for the upper flag grommet. For the bottom grommet I used the ring and screw. Works Great! The ball on the end is plastic chrome, maybe aluminum would have been better. Other than that, very pleased with the pole and the manufacturer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Flag Pole
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Works as intended. Flag does not tangle around the pole. Very satisfied. Good customer service. Multiple emails reaching out to verify that I'm satisfied with the product. Would order again and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up in windy areas
customer_reviews.text: We live up on a hill and get a lot of wind. Frequent wind with some gusts but nothing high that is sustained. After a few months the white plastic on the female end of the pole fell in. I contacted the company and they sent me a new pole, but the same thing happened again after a few months. I applaud the company for their response but I don't think that they will be willing to send me a new pole every time this happens.
customer_reviews.author: Buergermeister

customer_reviews.title: Flag pole is built like a tank... But mounting rings are laughably flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: The cheap plastic mounting rings are going to break long before the rest of the flag pole does. Replace them with paracord when the time comes and you'll be fine. Also, hope that the mounting ring thumb screws are larger in diameter than the grommets in your flag, otherwise you'll need some big washers to cover the difference.
customer_reviews.author: chrisazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great Home Flagpole
customer_reviews.text: I had been very unhappy with a flimsy flagpole around which my flag often twisted. This flagpole solves that problem nicely, The top half of the pole rotates with respect to the bottom half, so the flag always hangs straight down. There is only one minor drawback. If you want to fly your flag at half-staff, the bottom of the flag has to attach to the fixed part of the pole. This arrangement does allow the flag to twist around the flagpole. As long as you don’t fly the flag at half-staff, however, this pole performs great.
customer_reviews.author: L. E. Deimel

customer_reviews.title: Works well - so far
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two flag poles and both work perfectly and - most importantly - the flags do not bunch up and wrap around the poles like my old ones did. They seem high quality and so far I love the product. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Jones

customer_reviews.title: This flag never gets tangled
customer_reviews.text: Not only thew flag pole itself is durable and easy to use, they have great customer service and even gave me spare parts that ho;ld the flag in place, just in case it is loose. I reccomand buying a flag pole from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: chao wang

customer_reviews.title: Seek others
customer_reviews.text: The top clip rusted out after a few months and the interior plastic went brittle. The bottom plastic piece that holds the bottom eyelet never really held the bottom on. I would find the flag hanging by the top eyelet often. The bottom plastic clip broke and I zip tied it down for a while. I ended up throwing this away after 9ish months. Currently looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: KrisB

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I am glad we gave up on the wooden flagpoles from the big box stores. This one allows our seasonal flags to fly in our windy area without having to untangle it all the time. Well-designed and strong. Highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dale E. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Good customer service from the manufacturer. Easy to assemble, I had a flag flying within 15 minutes. This is a replacement purchase. My old flagpole lasted for over 10 years before high winds finally broke it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: I found this great product while surfing Amazon looking for a replacement flag ...
customer_reviews.text: I found this great product while surfing Amazon looking for a replacement flag pole. My old flag pole did not allow the flag to rotate in the wind so I had to unfurl the flag several times a day. Installed this new pole and no longer had to unfurl the tangled flag. Having the flag fly correctly is important to a verteran like myself and to other veterans. If you are having flag problems like I had, then the investment in this flag pole will be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: John Shockey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, item was as described, delivery was as promised, very sturdy. Would highly recommend to others, company is great gives you directions and if you need any help they are there for you. Will order from again.
customer_reviews.author: stitches4606

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It works MOST of the time. Eventually my flag got all twisted and I had to take it apart to get it right again. It did survive spring summer and fall though and that’s an improvement from my last pole
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Shunk

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy. Time will tell, No mounting brackets for flag. I was able to use one from the old broken pole. Would have been better if they supplied all needed universal components. Note: I raised this rating from three to five because of the customer service of the seller which showed true and genuine concern. They took care of my issue promptly. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Order this!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE having an AMerican flag hanging outside my home. However, it always got tangled. Ordered this one and bam! No.More. Tangles. Easy to assemble, love it. So happy I ordered this pile/flag. God Bless America!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: It’s the little things...
customer_reviews.text: This is not expensive or fancy, but it does just what it says and it looks really nice. It really is the little things that make life so much better. I love seeing our flags flying exactly as they’re meant to, rather than bunching up.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mayes

customer_reviews.title: This flagpole does not tangle
customer_reviews.text: The brushed aluminum is beautiful, and is a nice upgrade from our prior wooden flagpole. But the best part is that we have not had to untangle our new flag once since we put it up weeks ago. We have had beautiful breezes that would have easily tangled our old flag/flagpole.
customer_reviews.author: CindyV

customer_reviews.title: Quick company response after pole failed after 2 1/2 months.
customer_reviews.text: This flag pole failed a couple of months after purchase. The same thing happened to the last one I had. A small tube (internal) fell out then all the ball bearings came out. Sad really, I do like the functionality when it works. And, the company responded very quickly and a sending a new pole. You have to appreciate a company that stands by their guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: allen w. parsons

customer_reviews.title: Product is very nice and putting the flag on is simple
customer_reviews.text: Product is very nice and putting the flag on is simple. The two mounting rings are attached to the pole via a screw. As you're attaching the brackets to the pole merely run the screw through the grommets on your flag and then screw it into the brackets. The pole itself rotates as the flag is blown in the wind not the mounting rings. If the grommets on your flag are too large, you can use the included clip.
customer_reviews.author: CAK

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The flag pole is solid. It has undergone wind gusts of 70 mph and it’s holding my 3’ x 5’ flag with no problems. The plastic rings that attach the flag to the pole are of concern but right now they seem to be doing the job.
customer_reviews.author: WilCo

customer_reviews.title: A pole that outperforms all others!
customer_reviews.text: Are you American? Do you love America? Do you have an awesome pole yet? Order this one, and fly my Ol' Glory with pride! (Caution: Flying the American flag may cause overwhelming pride and emotion from your veteran neighbors...) God Bless America! Just like to add... Im in Florida. It gets windy. This flag pole has lasted over a year now, through storms, hurricanes, and severe weather. If it ever breaks, I'm buying another just like it.
customer_reviews.author: Perry C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love this flagpole. Does exactly as stated and the flag doesn’t get wrapped around. I bought another Tangle-less flag pole a few years ago for double the price. Great value with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B

customer_reviews.title: An OK pole
customer_reviews.text: Although the body is aluminum, the ball is very shiny and not durable. Also, you will have to order a bracket as that does not come with it. I would suggest for long term use....spend more for a more substantial pole...and bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for wind
customer_reviews.text: While the flag pole was easy enough to install and assemble its quality is low. The pole snapped about a month in from the wind. I was able to repair it but that didn’t last for long. Two weeks coming home to a flag on the ground. Not recommended if you live in a windy area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best Flag Pole I bought
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best Flag Pole I bought. Only gave it 4 stars due to the plastic flag rings. If they would put flag rings on this pole like the ones offered by another manufacturer (aluminum with clips that rotate) it would be perfect. I will get them and change them out when they are delivered.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve flown a flag on my home for decades and this is the best pole I’ve ever had. Surprised at how sturdy this flagpole is and how much care was taking in packaging. Very easy to assemble. Great too that they offer brushed silver. Excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Gassman

product_meta.title: Flag Pole - 6 Foot Silver Brushed Aluminum No Tangle Spinning Flagpole with Silver Globe Built Tough and Beautiful to Fly Grommeted or Sleeve Flags Proudly in Residential House or Commercial Settings

feature_bullets: No longer suffer the frustration of your flag wrapping around your flag pole in the wind. Replace the stationary flag pole that came in your original set with this superior quality 6 ft LONG by 1 in DIAMETER spinning flag pole, specifically DESIGNED TO PROHIBIT FLAG TANGLING.

Proudly fly any 2x3 foot through 3x5 foot GROMMETED or SLEEVE FLAG without tangles - guaranteed - to perfectly complement your home or business. Our flag poles are made from HEAVY DUTY ALUMINUM that is LIGHT YET STRONG so you can mount them QUICKLY and ENJOY them for years to come. (mounting bracket sold separately)
Our flag poles ship in a PRESENTATION BOX making them an excellent gift for friends or yourself! Serves as a perfect first time or replacement flag pole for residential home or commercial use.
